name: Break The Limit
description:
Break the limit is an endless arcade game where this genre has no end or will continue to run until we hit or hit obstacles, the target of the game is PC users because, pc is more the main choice of game players than cellphones or other.

Break the limit resembling a flupy bird game the difference is a better graphic and in terms of obstacles it is more varied than flupy bird, this game is played in single player just like flupy bird and the aim of this game is to avoid all obstacles while taking coins near the obstacles .
